name: An Unfinished Journey
description:
An unfinished journey.

A game prototype made in 72h by a single person for the Ludum Dare 35.

It's an Adventure Time fan game where you are playing a sea lard traveling around the world of Ooo trying to make friends.

Controls :

  • Move : Left and Right arrow
  • Shapeshifting : QWERT and Up arrow

More info on my Ludum Dare page : http://ludumdare.com/compo/ludum-dare-35/?action=preview&uid=43978
